title: If you rework pantheon, can you please make him more like Cassia from HoTS?
body:
She is so fun to play and her spear is a skillshot
I have a lot more fun with her than Pantheon, personally. I enjoy pantheon, but Cassia is just a cooler verison of him.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NZkdtQ1fOZY

replies.body: cassia is fun but her passive is 100% busted, but we have more hard cc in lol so stoping her movement would not be as bad. the more i think about it the more i think if they did rework panth to be like cassia it would turn out well.

Well Riot way of doing stuff like that is usually something like gain X% of bonus movement speed as armor (or something like that) which also means it basically does nothing the moment she is hit with just a slow
Cassia used to be hard  countered pretty bad by Chromie, Kal and a few others before all the armor changes. Not to say she wasn't strong but Kal ult could 100-0 you if you went below 75% health.
Bro heroes of the storm has lots of ideas i wish league would adopt
Especially her E
But sadly ðŸ˜† people in the league communities would cry op op broken

OP passive. Gets rewarded by just walking...
wait...{{champion:157}}

Except, as the video points out, she just gets destroyed if she gets stunned.
Also, it doesn't help against magic damage.

As for Yasuo, it makes no difference to the person playing against him whether it's based on movement or is just a CD. In fact, it's preferable to have it be based on movement since you can pause its "CD" by immobilizing him. It just makes him feel a little bit cooler, it doesn't add any power to his kit unless he's playing with a teamcomp specifically designed to make him go fast (and even then, there are much better champions for that than Yasuo).
Blizzard > Riot.

> [{quoted}](name=PowerSlave993,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9OgpXweX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-29T10:16:04.009+0000)
>
> Blizzard > Riot.

Ye m8
especially Blaze being pure useless,Zoe 2.0 but oneshot you at level 1 called Chromie,Cho'Gal(just fact he even exist in this game)  my favorite reworking stealth mechanics  to complete fuckery.

I will agree to the stealth mechanics, I was enjoying Q build Valeera ( Q in stealth ) and then they make only E useful. Also, Blaze has bunker, is tanky, has sustain, engage and almost ALWAYS goes even in lane. He can not win lane but he can not lose too.

Lots of people can't get used to low "obvious damage" tanks. You know.. The ones that don't seem like much untill you check scoreboard at the end of game. Blaze belongs to that group. He might be fine, but he's far from "power fantasy" some players want to have while playing.

I myself stopped playing after stealth rework. They made it so damn... Dissapointing.
Nah fam blaze needs his passive to smash people

> [{quoted}](name=ProbablyUezsch,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9OgpXweX,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-08-29T10:50:27.361+0000)
>
> Ye m8
> especially Blaze being pure useless,Zoe 2.0 but oneshot you at level 1 called Chromie,Cho'Gal(just fact he even exist in this game)  my favorite reworking stealth mechanics  to complete fuckery.

Clearly you havent played HoTs in a long while. chromie is not nearly as cancerous as u describe her. :)
Hots is supposed to be a quick game. If you get one shot by Chromie then you're doing something wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=ProbablyUezsch,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9OgpXweX,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-08-29T10:50:27.361+0000)
>
> Ye m8
> especially Blaze being pure useless,Zoe 2.0 but oneshot you at level 1 called Chromie,Cho'Gal(just fact he even exist in this game)  my favorite reworking stealth mechanics  to complete fuckery.

chromie just got gutted and she fucking sucks now btw
blizz put chromie in the dumpster recientily because of her range and damage plus she has no mobility or rng aspect like zoe.
I'm slightly butthurt considering Casia's supposed to be D2 hero, yet she's fucking nothing like amazon from D2.
She's a javazon, which is what a lot of people played anyways (spamming lightning fury).  She is missing all the bow skills but it's hard to fit both into one character.

Javazon or not. The point I'm making is Cassia doesnt have even 1 ability that matches her D2 original. Javazon had like 10 goddamn amazing abilities in D2. not even 1 got to HOTS. Not even single fucking one.
Yet OW heroes, who by only have 4 abilities? Even if those break HOTS in half (mobility is just as big issue in HOTS as it is in LOL), Who cares, they will still get exactly the same kits cause OW is popular.
Almost every D2 hero is the same. Maybe except Diablo and Necro.... to some extend.
Cassia might be fun as a hero, but they took her D2 identity and replaced it with w/e this shit she has right now.

Just imagine any Blizzard hero you like being totally different in hOTS **for no reason.**

What are you talking about?

Lightning Fury was the premier Javazon ability and Cassia has it.  It's pretty much the same ability.  
Fend isn't exactly the same but it's close enough.  
Her Evade passive is just like Amazon's Evade passive.  
She even has Valkyrie, though I'll admit it's different, sure, since it's not just a pet that follows you around.

Ball Lightning and the flashy blind thingie are new, sure, but she has a lot of classic Javazon abilities still.  Could they have added more instead of those?  Sure, but to say that she doesn't even have one is still when she does.

Yea, it's lightning fury only be its name. It's NOWHERE NEAR how LF worked in D2.

D2 evade passive was whole different thing. It was meant to make her slippery and squishy, while in HOTS its making her a fucking tank with extra steel plates on top.

The valkyrie part.. Dude.. Just because it has an animation or it contains "valkyrie" in the name means jack shit, if the ABILITY is different than D2.

Valk in D2 was never much of a "i'll go melee" unless she was cornered and couldn't do anything better. And even then she'd throw thunder gods around. And "amazon" in HOTS is pretty much melee with everything to make her work as a melee. Yea, she does have range, but she doesn't have it at its core.

---

To summ it up 3 abilities that somewhat relate HOTS amazon to javazon from D2 relate in fact only by name. She also has 2 new abilities. And the only thing that came from D2 is her passive, that was also changed/buffed to fit in her "i am melee now" theme. That sure feels like really well copied hero from their own game. 1/6 abilties made into the HOTS. Out of fucking 10 they could have used (30 if they'd use also her other D2 skill-trees).

She COULD be an "I'll go melee" character.  Just because everyone played her doing nothing but throwing Lightning Fury doesn't mean that's the only thing she could do.  Javazon actually had more melee abilities than ranged ones.

>D2 evade passive was whole different thing. 

Having damage reduction is effectively equivalent to having evade, except it's less RNG.  That's a good thing, IMO.  Otherwise it's functionally the same; the point being she's hard to damage while moving. Same as D2.

> 1/6 abilties made into the HOTS. 

Evade was in D2, Fend was in D2, Lightning Fury was in D2, Valkyrie was in D2.  Just because they don't work exactly like your strict vision of them doesn't mean they're not those abilities.

Maybe they should have focused on being a ranged character with Lightning Fury as her only ability because that's how most people played Amazon, but taking the skills as is from the game, Javazons actually were biased towards melee.

>Evade was in D2, Fend was in D2, Lightning Fury was in D2, Valkyrie was in D2. 

Just because you name something as it was in D2 doesn't mean jack shit if it doesn't do the same thing.
If you really don't get this then I see no point talking with a thick wall of brick, really.

Oh but they do the same thing.  I'm sorry that you're so restricted in your thinking that you can't imagine an AOE melee attack named "Fend" being anything similar to an AOE melee attack in a different shape named "Fend".

Granny Smiths and McIntoshs look different, but they're both apples.

I enjoyed our chat, brick wall.

> Granny Smiths and McIntoshs look different, but they're both apples.

From my pov those are 2 different fruits and thats the whole effing issue
Nah dude fuck playing against Cassia. She starts moving and if your AA based your fucked.

Most of the AAs in HotS have some sort of movement impairing ability, Cassia E roots herself and anyway the passive is balanced around being in teamifghts 80% of the match.

Giving the right numbers it can be easily and healthly transported into LoL.
It would be a divisive rework figuring he has been played a lot for a long time.

i was sort of hoping they would push the god of war aspect further than the weaponry aspect 

where hes a superhuman being who uses strong weapons rather than a human who uses super weapons

like kratos in god of war

yknow ill just drop my panth rework concept here
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/K0JXj3Q9-my-pantheon-rework-v3
if they rework him, i want asol to murder him in the lore again and have it be a avatar all together, thus explaining different looks and what not
But Atreus is the only good thing about the Pantheon lore.

I would love to see pantheon's spear working like Vayne' condemn but taking that Riot likes inovation.. they gonna make a spear that makes kebab if it hits few champions in a line, like the main spell of this Cassia

btw that energy ball looks like something Ryze had in his previous versions haha

I watched the video and I am not a fan of that design.  Pantheon could be better, and maybe a skillshot spear could help, but he is still much better designed than that HotS character in my honest opinion.

That R...

Brand ult comes to mind.
100% agree. It also allows somebody like Cassia to remain relevant throughout the game.
Just saying that her HP bar at the time of the spotlight was as big as a very mobile assassin, and she blocked 65% with the passive, now she blocks 40% but has a lot more HP.
If* you mean When, Pantheon is extremely toxic in design I deserves to be the next reworked champion.
I can guarantee you that some 'famous' mordekaiser main will threat Meddler, Reav and everyone if it happen.
TBH I think a panth rework could be even better.
wow that Cassia looks really fun. Her spear looks like Vel'koz Q
Would 100% love to see a rework on this champ that adds skill to the kit

It looks nice but all pantheon really need is a change of his Q and E, the rest of his kit is pretty fine imo. His passive support diving and encourages aggressive behavior for a lane bully, but that other passive is just a more busted Yas' passive and a middle finger to adc's.
Why make anything similar to that trash game tho

Hots has a lot of interesting gameplay and champion concepts. I'll never choose it over LoL but it can definitely be fun as long as you don't treat it as a super competitive game like we tend to do with LoL.

Can we just delete pantheon? 
That would make me happier than joffrey death in GoT
